about_the_game:
Journey into lands dying and dead to collect black magic grimoires and prolong the Skulltide, so that all skeleton-kind may evade the Grim Reaper forevermore! Grapple with magic that would kill any mortal mage (you die too, you just reanimate). Wield blades renowned through all the lands (taken from the corpses of their former wielders).

Throw your bones, raise the dead, lose your head, and find it again!

  • Local and Online Co-op, or both at once!

  • Mix-and-match abilities tied to your bones. Gain and lose them all!

  • Limbs, skulls, ribs... If you can't find your own, raise some new ones!

  • Collect the spells of those raised, the blades of those killed, and the bodies of those fallen!

  • Casual to pick up, granting benefits to individual players who need it.

  • Endless combinations and possibilities, creating a high skill ceiling!

Among all the dead who rise to join the Skulltide, there may be heroic queens and formidable warlocks, there might even be a hero fighting alongside the bones of a killer. However, all are equal before the altar of death! Work together to evade the Grim Reaper, and with Skulltide's adaptive difficulty in PvE & PvP, losing will always mean you come back stronger.

You can't keep a dead man down.

  • Customize your skeletal remains with materials and magicks you discover in your journeys.

  • Build classes with sets of abilities taken from enemies, and lose them when you fall.

  • Each death returns to the crypt with more black magic Grimoires in this roguelite!

  • Reanimate your friends to keep the tide alive!

The days of the living have come to an end, the Skulltide has begun! The dead have risen from every grave, to either hasten the end or live immortal through it all! As the final sun sets, it is not simple zombies that come from every graveyard, crypt, and burial mound; it is the souls of those already taken by death who return to their long-lost bones. Many are mad and will turn against you, others will join as necromantic allies, and you may even encounter the last gasps of life, not yet taken by Death.

If life should fail, unlife will prevail.

The Dark Star rises!

name: Skulltide Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: R9 290/GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070, Radeon RX 6700 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: Skeletal mischief reigns as the Skulltide begins! Join the undead in co-op adventures as the skeleton of your dreams, or lead them yourself, and hunt down the necromancers who reanimated you. Try not to misplace your bones along the way!
